comment.body:
@Alex-302 

> @flomme Hi. Not repdocuced. Could you please test with enabled `Hide referrer from third party`, but when all filters are disabled?

"Hide referrer from third party" was literally the last thing left to try. 
I started by disabling filters one by one. Then went on to disabling switches under "General" one by one. Lastly disabling switches under "Stealth mode" one by one. 
So all filters was turned of when I  finally got to "Hide referrer from third party" 
I then went on to turn everything on, but "Hide referrer from third party" on again
